label: [Jmap] Email over Json
info: Fastmail JMAP interaction. See this [article](https://blog.openmindmap.org/blog/jmap-send-email-flow) for more details on the background of JMAP. ### Environment Assumes that `FASTMAIL_API_TOKEN` is defined in the environment. ### Sequence diagrams Sequence diagram for `[fm] init - v1`: ```mermaid sequenceDiagram Flow->>Fastmail (WellKnown): Please provide Account details Fastmail (WellKnown)->>Flow: account_id & uploadUrl for FASTMAIL_API token Flow->>Flow: Append account Id to `msg` Flow->>Flow: Append upload URL to `msg` Flow->>Fastmail (API): Send Draft folder id Fastmail (API)->>Flow: draft folder id Flow->>Flow: Store draft folder id on `msg` object Flow->>Fastmail (API): Provide a list of registered sender emails Fastmail (API)->>Flow: Mapping of from email to ID Flow->>Flow: Store mapping on `msg` object ``` Sequence diagram for `[fm] init - v2`: ```mermaid sequenceDiagram Flow->>Fastmail (WellKnown): Please provide Account details Fastmail (WellKnown)->>Flow: account_id for FASTMAIL_API token Flow->>Flow: Append account Id to `msg` Flow->>Flow: upload URL to `msg` Flow->>Fastmail (API): Send Draft folder id & list of registered sender emails Fastmail (API)->>Flow: draft folder id & registered emails Flow->>Flow: Store draft folder id on `msg` object Flow->>Flow: Store sender email mapping on `msg` object ``` Sending emails `[fm] send email`: ```mermaid sequenceDiagram Flow->>Flow: Initialise Fastmail Flow->>Flow: Construct email object Flow->>Fastmail (API): Create draft email in draft folder & send email from there Fastmail (API)->>Flow: email sent ``` Sending emails with attachment, `[fm] send email with attachments`: ```mermaid sequenceDiagram Flow->>Flow: [fm] init - v2 Flow->>Flow: Construct zip containing original payload Flow->>Fastmail (UploadURL): Upload Zip and obtain blobId Fastmail (UploadURL)->>Flow: blobId of Zip file Flow->>Flow: Create email including attachment details Flow->>Flow: [fm] send email (no warmup) ```

name: get account_id

send email
